summary: This module defines a diffusion pipeline for the PixArt Sigma model, integrating a T5 text encoder, a 2D transformer, and a VAE decoder. It manages prompt tokenization, image preprocessing, scheduler configuration, aspect‑ratio handling, and latent diffusion steps to produce images from textual inputs within the Diffusers ecosystem.
business_intent: Provide developers with a ready‑to‑use, configurable solution for high‑quality text‑to‑image generation based on the PixArt Sigma architecture, facilitating integration of advanced generative AI capabilities into applications.
